name: Ninja Shinobi
description:
*SORRY IT TAKES SO LONG TO LOAD!*

Ninja Shinobi is a fun, challenging, addictive, platform game were you have to beat all of the levels, pass challenging obstacles, and much more! Will you be able to beat all levels? Good luck, and have fun!

How to play:

Jump: (up arrow) *press and hold to glide*

Forward: (right arrow) *use to move through the obstacles*

Backwards: (left arrow) *use to move backwards if you mess up or need more space*

Features (Update 1):

•20 levels to complete (so far.)

•2 Player Trails to unlock (unlock with in-game currency.)

•Obstacles to dodge (Traps, spikes, holes, etc.)

*Made By ItsJetty*
